sentences.en: Darts of bright light shot asunder , darkness swept over the centre of the lake.
sentences.cn: 明亮的光标飞向四方, 黑暗趁虚而入席卷了湖心.

sentences.en: Even Jordan's party; the quartet from East Egg, were rent asunder by dissension.
sentences.cn: 连乔丹的那一伙,从东卵来的那四位, 也由于意见不和而四分五裂了.

sentences.en: He went up to the curtains, and, drew them asunder.
sentences.cn: 他走到那些帘子面前, 就把帘拉开.

sentences.en: Here all seems fallen asunder, in wide - yawning dislocation.
sentences.cn: 这里似乎一切都陷入了崩裂, 天塌地陷般地混乱.

sentences.en: Parents and children were driven asunder by the war.
sentences.cn: 父母和子女因战争而分离.

sentences.en: The boat was torn asunder on the rocks.
The curtains had been drawn asunder.
The debate is tearing Wall Street asunder.
sentences.cn: 这场争论令华尔街分崩离析。

sentences.en: The dream had snapped asunder - he was awake.
sentences.cn: 好梦一下子被打散了 —— 他被惊醒过来.

sentences.en: The stone was rent asunder / apart.
The war forced the parents and children asunder.
sentences.cn: 战争把父母子女拆散了.

sentences.en: Those whom God has put asunder no man can join together.
sentences.cn: 上帝给分开的东西,谁也不能使之结合.

sentences.en: We are as wide asunder as the poles.
sentences.cn: 我们天南地北相隔极远.

sentences.en: Your conscience, conviction, integrity, and loyalties were torn asunder.
sentences.cn: 你的良心 、 信念 、 正直和忠诚都被扯得粉碎了.

trans.tran_cn: 分离的； 化为碎片的
trans.tran_en: If something tears or is torn asunder, it is violently separated into two or more parts or pieces

trans.tran_cn: <文>分开地，分离地，成数部分（或数块），化为碎片
